name: burn-up
caption: Burn Up

effect.short: Removes the user's []{type:fire} type after inflicting damage.
effect.full: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  Removes the user's []{type:fire} type after damage calculation.  If the user is not []{type:fire}-type, this move will fail.

flavorText:
To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out.
After using this move, the user will no longer be
Fire type.
